name: Double Pendulum (cantclimbout)
description:
THE DOUBLE PENDULUM:

Have you ever wanted to play around with a double pendulum and see what kind of kooky patterns it creates as it swings from side to side? 

I know I have! So I made a simulation with lots of sliders. I then realized that it might be interesting to some people, and cantclimbout's Double Pendulum was born.

FEATURES:

- Lots of customization options!

- Screenshot hotkey for Windows and Mac editions. (saves to appdata/CCOPendulum/Screenshots on Windows)

- Some nice music in the background
